Title: Battle of Surabaya
Writer: M. Suyanto (story), Aryanto Yuniawan (screenplay), Aryanto Yuniawan (story)
Actors: Reza Rahadian, Keagan Kang, Maudy Ayunda, Marlon Dance-Hooi
Plot: Musa, a thirteen-year-old shoe shiner, with Yumna, undergoes destiny through their adventure of waging war during the war time. Will they manage to bring peace among the troops keeping on fighting for nothing?
